DESCRIPTION: Consumes all #yCombo stacks on use for an enhanced effect.
A #yStarter will start a Combo but can't increase the stacks of an ongoing Combo.
Combo chain enhances the effectiveness of #yFinishers.
Ki-burns are ethereal status cards that consume Ki when drawn.
When #yTraining you can't use any cards that target enemies.
After gaining 2 stacks of #yMedicine, transform then into 1 #yArtifact.
Receive 50% less damage, lose a stack of #yFlight when attacked. When losing flight gain #b1 Weak.
A follow-up increases your current #yCombo, but can't start a #yCombo
When this minion dies it revived Stunned but empowered.
Can only take a certain amount of damage per turn.
If you have the required Ki available, consume it to enhance the effects of this card.
This card can only be played if you have played a Full Moon this fight.
You are huge! NL When transforming gain 15 Ki Regen, 8 Plated Armor and 4 Strength.
Concussed creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Concussion is increased by 1.
When hit, deal that much damage to the attacker.
When attacked, the attacker receives damage equal to the stacks of #yKi-Barrier. Expires at the end of the round.
Can only be used on Vulnerable enemies.
